description: I would always go with easyTag over this one in general because everything feels so manual..but I can recommend this if you want tag your music with ReplayGain tags for sure. The software includes a plug-in to analyze and tag your music with ReplayGain tags and it even lets you edit the values afterwards if you want to adjust it further yourself.
summary: Manual but very powerful tagging app

description: More options seem to be set manually in this application, but it is very complete. It's got a clean and simple layout and I found saving custom patterns for tagging and renaming files very useful. I have yet to experience any problems with this application while tagging my audio files. Unusual characters in formatting and duplicate fields caused problems in other programs, but were recognized and easily fixed in exfalso. The best out there.
I've some music that I can't purchase through the Google Play Store, (Unavailable) and I wanted to edit those tags. With this app, I can edit all my tags. Thanks!

Installed automatically with Quod Libet (which is also very good), it is the best audiotagging software I've found for handing large amounts of music at a time.
I found it a little bit slow, but maybe that's my machine.
Ich war auf der Suche nach einem Pendant zu mp3tag (win) bzw. puddletag (LINUX) leider nicht annähernder Ersatz.
Me parece una aplicación completa, y bien hecha.
Permite editar mis carpetas de canciones de manera mas rapida
Love it, now it's easier to make some modifications
Prise en mains facile pour ce programme, qui m'est très utile pour mettre des étiquettes sur mes fichiers musicaux. Je recommande.
